EwtRzAFiXEM.title: Copilot for PowerShell
EwtRzAFiXEM.author: Visual Studio Code
EwtRzAFiXEM.description:
If you want to learn how to use GitHub Copilot, the AI pair programmer that helps you write code faster and better, then this video is for you.
ðŸ‘‰  Install & start your free trial: https://aka.ms/get-copilot

0:00 Introduction 
0:55 Providing Context
2:17 Pair Coding with PowerShell
4:36 Github Copilot CLI
5:38 Summary

More info: https://github.com/features/copilot
Quick startup guide: https://docs.github.com/en/copilot/quickstart

Host:  Pierre Roman
#GitHubCopilot #AIPairProgrammer #OpenAICodex #CodeGeneration #powershell

enter have a second pane in my vs code where GitHub copilot will synthesize up to 10 suggestions so I can review them and take the one that I feel is more appropriate for what I'm trying to do so I'm
